Text: There will be a major change on 1 October: an adjustment to the maximum permissible interest rate (MIPR), which is used to calculate aged care accommodation costs. The rate today is 5.54 per cent p.a., and it will drop to 4.98 per cent p.a.
Cause: There will be a major change on 1 October: an adjustment to the maximum permissible interest rate (MIPR), which is used to calculate aged care accommodation costs.
Effect: The rate today is 5.54 per cent p.a., and it will drop to 4.98 per cent p.a.
Sentence: <e1>There will be a major change on 1 October: an adjustment to the maximum permissible interest rate (MIPR), which is used to calculate aged care accommodation costs.</e1> <e2>The rate today is 5.54 per cent p.a., and it will drop to 4.98 per cent p.a.</e2>
